Class ApplicationWindow

java.lang.Object
ApplicationWindow
All Implemented Interfaces:
KeyListener, MouseListener, MouseMotionListener, EventListener
public class ApplicationWindow extends Object implements MouseListener, MouseMotionListener, KeyListener
This class creates the window in which the application will main application will run
